maxWidth.description: Controls the maximum width of the hero container

useContainerMargin.description:
Custom margin behavior - can override default container margin
Set to false to remove default margins

headerText.description: The main header text displayed prominently in the hero section

captionText.description: Optional caption text that appears below the header

backgroundFill.description: Background fill that can be either a color string or an image object. When an image is provided, it will stretch to cover the entire component background

height.description: The height of the hero container

className.description: Additional CSS class name for custom styling
